changelog.release_notes: Fix auto detection of country and from the country to default temperature scale (metric or imperial).  Add configuration of the order of minimum and maximum temperatures.
Custom day of week.  You can enter your own day of week abbreviations.

Fixed developer hack where the current conditions is always sunny.  Oops!

In progress:  enhanced custom day of the week abbreviation.
Fix spacing between current temperature and current conditions (in top left).
Fix bug when the date is a single digit (undisplayable space character).
Added single letter abreviations for days of the week.  Color configuration for Pebble Time.
Fix forecast off by one day.  Symptom: early in the morning, the first forecast is yesterday.  Code has a workaround for when openweathermap returns yesterday as a forecast.
Setting for default location when the location cannot be detected.
Fix recall of settings for timeout and forecast.  Minor positioning adjustment of hourly temperatures.
Configuration for timeout and preferred forecast.
Don't turn on debugging for spurious location detection error.
Fix time of the weather forecast.
Fix hourly forecast display for 12 hour format.  Remember configuration selections on the configuration page,
Configurable color and temperature scale.
Enable multilingual (localization).
Better horizontal adjustment of 12 hour time.
Added AM and PM to 12 hour display.
Fixed string copy overwrite bug.  Added debug mode & display.
Minor adjustment of hourly conditions icon display.
Fix bug in one of the hour forecast display.

data.description: Watchface with time and weather forecast. Under development. Current temperature and weather conditions at top left. Celsius or Fahrenheit configurable. Shows seconds with a shake or tap. The seconds go away after a few minutes to save battery life. The forecast alternates between daily and hourly forecasts with a shake or tap. Weather forecast provided by openweathermap, updated every 60 minutes.
